title: Summer Fruit Crumble
ingredients: ['3 nectarines, pitted and cut into bite-size pieces', '3 tart plums, pitted and cut into bite-size pieces', '125g fresh raspberries', '125g plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '150g cold unsalted butter']
